tabs.tab_content:
• Aramid high tenacity FR thread
  • All metal thermally protected from the skin
  • Bar-tacked at all stress points
  • Adjust neck neck strap with snaps

• HRC2
  • ATPV 8.6 cal/cm2 (electric arc flash rating)
  • NFPA 1975-2009,NFPA 70E-2004, ASTMF 1506-2010a,CAN/CGSB 155.20-2000, CAN/CGSB 155.22-97,et OSHA 29 CFR1910.269, EN ISO11611:2008, EN ISO11612:2008, EN ISO14116:2008,AS/NZ 4399
  • UL certified NFPA2112-2012
  • OEKO-TEX Standard 100
